title: HAP 38 - My Haitian Pen - Baron de Vastey
itunes:title: HAP 38 - My Haitian Pen - Baron de Vastey
description: The Baron de Vastey unveils the horror of colonialism as a system and defends the monarchy of King Christophe in the tense early years of Haiti’s independence.
content:encoded: The Baron de Vastey unveils the horror of colonialism as a system and defends the monarchy of King Christophe in the tense early years of Haiti’s independence.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
